overview: Two sisters who share a tragic, unspeakable secret...A young man consumed by a bizarre psychosexual fetish...A world at once dreamlike and dreadful into which they irrevocably pass. The mythical phoenix took its own life by fire only to rise again. Can flames of destruction promise ashes of renewal for these three tortured lives? Their search for an answer will prove to be a macabre and hypnotic journey...and a very strange love story.
tagline: In life, only death. Only in death, a rebirth.
title: Ashes and Flames
